title: The Teen Years 2011 (Flac) [FrankFoo]
description:
The Teen Years  (10 CD) 2011 (Flac) [FrankFoo]

Editorial Reviews
10 CD - 150 track box set!

The fifties and sixties were such a wonderful time to grow up and fall in love. 
It was the first time teenagers had their own music and their own love songs. 
Time Life is proud to offer The Teen Years, a new 10-CD, 150-song collection filled with teen idols, doo-wop groups, girl groups and more. 
It's the only rock 'n' roll collection devoted to the most romantic teen hits of the first (pre-Beatles) rock 'n' roll era.

We've included artists such as Ricky Nelson, Roy Orbison, The Everly Brothers, Dion, Frankie Avalon, The Platters, Bobby Darin, Paul Anka and Bobby Vinton, early rock 'n' roll legends like Buddy Holly and Ritchie Valens, plus lovely ladies like Connie Francis, Brenda Lee and Shelly Fabares.

It's the softer, sweeter, more romantic hits from the first decade of early rock 'n' roll. 
Plus, we've included an entire CD of the biggest love songs from the ultimate teen idol: Elvis.

-10-CD set with 150 songs! The Teen Years is the most complete collection of the soft and sweet rock hits of the fifties and sixties.
-Romantic & Nostalgic: Go back to the early days of rock 'n' roll, with teen idols and doo-wop legends - hear fun songs, girl groups, and many slow-dance classics.
-Each volume includes complete liner notes with photos and stories about the artists and their music.
-Highest Quality: Every song is the original hit, digitally re-mastered to give listeners "studio-perfect" sound.
-6 volumes: Dream Lover,Sixteen Candles, In the Still of the Night, My Special Angel, Hey! Baby and Elvis Is Love Songs. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Included.............: NFO, PLS, M3U
Covers...............: Front Back Booklet
